name: TVGHF Supporter Pack 2022
description:
Support game preservation by… buying games!

The Video Game History Foundation Support Pack is a special, time-limited bundle from which all proceeds go to game preservation initiatives. The Video Game History Foundation is a non-profit organization, with a team composed of veterans of the industry, that has made its mission to bring video game history back to life. Learn more about their mission and initiatives in our interview.

The pack includes two great classics:

Corsairs Gold
Plunge into a world of adventure and freedom and discover the excitement of sailing, the thirst for gold, thundering cannons, and savage pirate attacks.
In this historical strategy game, a fascinating quest will drive you to the four corners of the Earth. New adventures will await you in each port along your journey, as you will accumulate fortune for yourself and for your country, either by force or through your shrewd business dealings.

Daemonsgate
As classic as they come! Daemonsgate is an action RPG adventure, where you join in the exploits of Captain Gustavus and his loyal compatriots, travelling the lands of Hestor in search of strange Sage who may hold the knowledge that could save Gustavus homeland from despoiling horde of savage Daemons.

The Video Game History Foundation Support Pack 2022 is available to buy till October 9th, at 10 PM UTC.
